price: 51. Buunkaa la aafuufi10, mise kolkaa bay qubuurahooda ka soo yaaci iygoo u degdegaya xagga Rabbigood.
arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يَنسِلُونَ
footnotes: 10. Waxaa loola jeedaa afuufka labaad ee Buunka, markaasoo ay ka soo bixi doonaan qubuuraha iyagoo la soo nooleeyey.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wanufikha fī al-ṣūri fa-idhā hum mina al-ajdāthi ilā rabbihim yansilūna
